metadata.name: 01 - *SQUARE* - "PASSION"
metadata.description:
These creations were all made by hand on the famous Pont des Arts in Paris, 50 meters from the prestigious Louvre Museum.
In total, more than 150 creations were created during this summer of 2022.
Lukas decided to select the most beautiful of them for the pleasure of sharing a diversity that inspires us all.
For the little anegdote, it is at this very place that the SuperRare team, a year ago, met Lukas and took him on this magnificent nft adventure.
Here is the work number 1: "Passion"
www.lukas.works
